<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.f64&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RC == &amp;NVPTX::Int128RegsRegClass)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.b128&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RC == &amp;NVPTX::Int64RegsRegClass)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We use untyped (.b) integer registers here as NVCC does.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Correctness of generated code does not depend on register type,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but using .s/.u registers runs into ptxas bug that prevents</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// assembly of otherwise valid PTX into SASS. Despite PTX ISA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// specifying only argument size for fp16 instructions, ptxas does</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not allow using .s16 or .u16 arguments for .fp16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions. At the same time it allows using .s32/.u32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// arguments for .fp16v2 instructions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   .reg .b16 rb16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   .reg .s16 rs16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   add.f16 rb16,rb16,rb16; // OK</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   add.f16 rs16,rs16,rs16; // Arguments mismatch for instruction &#39;add&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   .reg .b32 rb32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   .reg .s32 rs32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   add.f16v2 rb32,rb32,rb32; // OK</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   add.f16v2 rs32,rs32,rs32; // OK</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.b64&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RC == &amp;NVPTX::Int32RegsRegClass)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.b32&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxtargetmachine">NVPTXTargetMachine</a> &amp;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#af777ff93c9e07a6ff5ffe3226deb3e76">getTarget</a>());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxregisterinfo/#a11ad79519e5b7b2729da9080d0c4c003"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxregisterinfo/#a11ad79519e5b7b2729da9080d0c4c003">NVPTXRegisterInfo::clearDebugRegisterMap</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  debugRegisterMap.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147" lineLink="#aab8b72686fab99a218789ee582f09c6b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="#aab8b72686fab99a218789ee582f09c6b">encodeRegisterForDwarf</a>(std::string registerName) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (registerName.length() &gt; 8) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The name is more than 8 characters long, and so won&#39;t fit into 64 bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Encode the name string into a DWARF register number using cuda-gdb&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// encoding.  See cuda&#95;check&#95;dwarf2&#95;reg&#95;ptx&#95;virtual&#95;register in cuda-tdep.c,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// https://github.com/NVIDIA/cuda-gdb/blob/e5cf3bddae520ffb326f95b4d98ce5c7474b828b/gdb/cuda/cuda-tdep.c#L353</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IE the bytes of the string are concatenated in reverse into a single</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number, which is stored in ULEB128, but in practice must be no more than 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bytes (excluding null terminator, which is not included).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t result = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> c : registerName)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">    result = (result &lt;&lt; 8) | c;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> result;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxregisterinfo/#a6b4972eff902518ef535018579cf0bb7"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxregisterinfo/#a6b4972eff902518ef535018579cf0bb7">NVPTXRegisterInfo::addToDebugRegisterMap</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t preEncodedVirtualRegister, std::string registerName)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t mapped = <a href="#aab8b72686fab99a218789ee582f09c6b">encodeRegisterForDwarf</a>(registerName);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (mapped == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  debugRegisterMap.insert(&#123;preEncodedVirtualRegister, mapped&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxregisterinfo/#ae271370eae878e78d2bad43aa2d68e1d"><span class="doxyHighlight">int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxregisterinfo/#ae271370eae878e78d2bad43aa2d68e1d">NVPTXRegisterInfo::getDwarfRegNum</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> RegNum, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> isEH)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RegNum.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister/#adab6a6e130a565c2cb11ef465fac90e7">isPhysical</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::string <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/smeabipass-cpp/#a8f8f80d37794cde9472343e4487ba3eb">name</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxinstprinter/#aa021e0896ced10e79b81454e4186a7f2">NVPTXInstPrinter::getRegisterName</a>(RegNum.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister/#af8403cc977c65b910e618ebcb6a12c32">id</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In NVPTXFrameLowering.cpp, we do arrange for %Depot to be accessible from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %SP. Using the %Depot register doesn&#39;t provide any debug info in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cuda-gdb, but switching it to %SP does.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RegNum.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister/#af8403cc977c65b910e618ebcb6a12c32">id</a>() == NVPTX::VRDepot)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/smeabipass-cpp/#a8f8f80d37794cde9472343e4487ba3eb">name</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;%SP&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#aab8b72686fab99a218789ee582f09c6b">encodeRegisterForDwarf</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/smeabipass-cpp/#a8f8f80d37794cde9472343e4487ba3eb">name</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/gsym/inlineinfo-cpp/#a5db99f4b7f8744e0b1c8b50dba8ec5a2">lookup</a> = debugRegisterMap.lookup(RegNum.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister/#af8403cc977c65b910e618ebcb6a12c32">id</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/gsym/inlineinfo-cpp/#a5db99f4b7f8744e0b1c8b50dba8ec5a2">lookup</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
